name: Rocket Man (AbyssDarkstar)
description:
Stuck in a never ending loop, your goal is to earn as much money as you can by launching rockets into space.

Select the rocket to use, configure it's cargo and pre-burn time, then hit the launch button and hope!

Escape: Opens the menu.

Hold Shift while managing cargo: Change quantity by 10

Hold Control while managing cargo: Change quantity by 100
